website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a GMC road bike that's available in three different sizes, so you can find the right fit.
pros: Offers a 21-speed road bike, allowing you to use the gear that fits the situation
Uses Shimano derailleur and shifting system to deliver quality
With three different sizes, it'll fit people from 5 feet 1 inch to 6 feet 5 inches
Road bike only weighs 30 pounds, meaning it's easy to maneuver
cons: Over the long run, it won't stand up well to extremely tough riding conditions

customer_reviews.title: i am pleased with the product and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: bicycle has performed to expectations. i ride same 4 times per week at 7.5 miles per ride, slow to fast speed, very hilly, 5 percent grades, asphalt to asphalt crushed surface. bike used for workout purposes and performs well especially in low low gear up hill. gears catch somewhat if shifting too fast or under strong load, otherwise 97 percent smooth shifting. i am pleased with the product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Know your assembly abilities
customer_reviews.text: Great bike if you have the patience to overcome the down sides. First bike showed up with a puncture and buckled front wheel, Second bike showed up with damage to front wheel and puncture. Took both bikes made one good unit. If you are not a good bike person pay for assembly and tuning it takes quite a while to adjust the brakes and gears to function as they should. Amazon extremely helpful on returns and replacement. Thanks to them have a great perfect bike just a couple of scratches, no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So smooth. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It is a replacement for a horrible bike I had. The bike was in perfect condition when it was delivered (my son scratched it with a screwdriver within an hour though), it went together very easy and rides smoother than I could have imagined. I do not know much about bikes but as someone who recently chose to use a bike as my main mode of transportation I am very pleased with it. Others say they do not like the seat. No complains so far but I may start to hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Shahin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly such a great bike for the price! I mountain bike but just recently decided to start biking to work so I needed a decent beginner road bike. This bike far exceeded my expectations! I have some cycling friends who have complimented the looks and how it rides. Great purchase and I'm still excited about it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bike but just not light enough
customer_reviews.text: I you're 5'8 -5'11 go with the medium size bike. Its not as light as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: SaiLife5K

customer_reviews.title: Bent rim and sprocket
customer_reviews.text: Product looked promising but the front rim arrived bent and the main sprocket is bent as well causing chain rubbing noise. I hope Amazon can resolve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter to ride in Pelitonia cancer ride. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great starter bike I changed the tires and took it to the shop for a tune up other then that rides great.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great little bike!
customer_reviews.text: Love it nice bike. Minor brake adjustment problem. No shipping damage! Thanx
customer_reviews.author: robert simmons

customer_reviews.title: Bent Rim
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike a lot, but when I put the bike together both rims were bent. The decals were also not stuck on very well so I actually just took them off and it looks a lot better. If the bikes run wasn't bent or I could get a hold of someone to have them replace it I would have given the bike 5 stars. But since I'm stuck going to buy a new rim for an inexpensive bike I'm pretty upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 100 miles on the bike now and it's riding pretty well. My biggest complaint is the front tired ...
customer_reviews.text: I've got about 100 miles on the bike now and it's riding pretty well. My biggest complaint is the front tired arrived waaaaay out of alignment. Think of putting a tortilla on a pencil and spinning that....slowly. It was bad. I couldn't straighten it so had to take it in. The bike technician's comment when seeing the wheel was "whoa". If you get this bike I recommend getting the professional assembly if they offer it. The amazon price for tune and assembly is probably better than you're going to get publicly and you'll likely need it. PS Brakes are bad. At minimum replace with some better brake pads.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Its seems like a good bike for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Its seems like a good bike for the price I paid. However, after a month of using it has started making creaking noise from a lot of places. Looks like it needs tightening quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Jayesh

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to never buy cheap products
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I purchased this bike I’ve probably spent more than $200 on repairing it. The gear, brakes, tires keep having problems. Highly recommend to never buy cheap products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice ride!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is a nice ride. My only complaint is that the seat is not very comfortable. If I replace it with a memory foam one my feet can't touch the ground. Overall it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an inexpensive base level bicycle like I was, keep looking. This is poorly engineered. The front tire rubs against your feet when you attempt to turn. To translate that for you, you can't make anything other than slight turns while you are pedaling. Obviously, that is a major design flaw. The front tire almost hits the frame as well with no clearance for the gear changing and rear brake wires. Pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: pchongbw

customer_reviews.title: meh, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived with a bent spoke on the front wheel. Wheels are not true. Bike's branding (stickers) have been applied very sloppy: tons of wrinkles and not applied symetrically. I can get over the lousy appliqué job, but a bent wheel is going to cost me time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Jax5

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and I have to be on my very tip toes to touch the ground. If I turn the wheel sharply, my foot will rub against the wheel. The front tire also has never held air. Not a good purchase. We finally got the tube replaced on the front tire, then took it out for the first long ride and 1/2 mile into the ride, the chain came off. Absolutely HORRIBLE purchase....
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: What a waste of money, very hard ride. I thought a bike was a bike but this bike taught me different I do not like it, I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: My bike shop took 70 dollars flat fee to assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: My bike shop took 70 dollars flat fee to assemble "box bikes". The bike itself was alright, the gears were a bit hard to use, but overall it was alright.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire :/
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the bike and it was fairly easy to put together for me. I put it all to the and aired up the tires and tested it out. As soon as I started riding it, the rear tire went flat. After taking the tube out of the tire, it became apparent that the tube was not installed correctly at the factory. The hole in the tube was on the seam of the inside wall of the tire. I was hoping to get a replacement tube from them, but I cannot find their contact information anywhere. As of now I'm dissatisfied with the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and time--don't buy this bike!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a nightmare, and the directions to put it together were not helpful whatsoever. After spending an additional two hours trying to properly assemble the hand brake, which only one of two was assembled upon arrival, I gave up and decided to take it to a local shop. When the bike shop repair guys told me I was looking at $80-100 in tune up and repairs, I decided to send this bike back to Amazon. I do realize some of that could be a possible up charge or rip off, but nonetheless it should not have been necessary to take it to a shop in the first place. Never again will I buy a bike online.
customer_reviews.author: JesiH

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for Bigfoot
customer_reviews.text: It sucked, and was to large to even get on. I regret my purchase entirely
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome perfect for me and im 411 .
customer_reviews.author: Kristie E.

product_meta.title: GMC Denali Flat Bar Road Bike
product_meta.description: The GMC Denali 700C 21-Speed Road Bike is built around a lightweight aluminum road bike frame. You'll stop on a dime with the alloy calipers and brake levers and the high-profile alloy Vitesse racing rims look as good as they perform. Shimano Revo shifters allow you to shift with out taking your hands off the handle bars providing safety and confidence. A Shimano derailleur completes the drive train for quick and smooth gear changes. Lastly, this road bike will help you stay hydrated with the included alloy water bottle cage.
feature_bullets: 21-speed road bike features a lightweight aluminum frame
Alloy side pull brake calipers and levers
Shimano derailleur and Shimano Revo shifts makes it easy to change gears quickly and smoothly
700c x 32mm tires handle a wide range of road conditions

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
